Package org.apache.oozie.action

Interface Summary
ActionExecutor.Context Context information passed to the ActionExecutor methods.
 

Class Summary
ActionExecutor Base action executor class.
 

Enum Summary
ActionExecutorException.ErrorType Enum that defines the type of error an ActionExecutor has produced.
 

Exception Summary
